pizza.name: Pizza / Pizzeria

typography.heading: 'Playfair Display', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Warm Italian-inspired headlines, clean readable body

imagery.hero: Fresh pizza being made, wood-fired oven, melted cheese
imagery.style: Artisan pizza making, rustic Italian atmosphere, fresh ingredients

pizza.visualPrompt: Create a warm, authentic pizzeria website. Hero should feature video of pizza being made or stunning pizza photography with Italian colors. Use warm Italian reds and golds. Include menu with pizza categories (specialty, classic, build-your-own), prices ($14-24), toppings. Sections: hero with order CTA, menu with pizza cards showing ingredients and prices, about section with Italian heritage/family story, photo gallery of pizzas and restaurant, testimonials, easy online ordering CTA, location with hours. Evoke authentic Italian pizzeria warmth.

restaurant.name: Restaurant / Food Service

typography.heading: 'Playfair Display', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Elegant serif headlines, clean readable body

imagery.hero: High-quality food photography, steam rising, warm lighting
imagery.style: Close-up food shots, ambient restaurant interior, chef in action

restaurant.visualPrompt: Create a warm, appetizing restaurant website. Hero should feature stunning food photography with warm color overlay. Use elegant serif fonts for headlines. Include subtle zoom effects on food images on hover. Sections should flow naturally: hero with reservation CTA, menu preview with beautiful dish cards, chef/story section with parallax image, photo gallery with lightbox, testimonials from diners, and prominent reservation call-to-action. Color palette should evoke warmth and appetite - deep browns, warm golds, cream backgrounds.

cafe.name: Coffee Shop / Cafe
cafe.vibe: Cozy, artisanal, community gathering spot, aromatic

typography.heading: 'Josefin Sans', sans-serif
typography.style: Modern friendly headlines, approachable body text

imagery.hero: Latte art, cozy interior, morning light through windows
imagery.style: Warm tones, steam from cups, rustic wood textures
imagery.unsplash: coffee shop latte art cozy cafe

cafe.visualPrompt: Create a cozy, inviting coffee shop website. Hero should show beautiful latte art or cozy interior with warm morning light. Typography should feel friendly and approachable. Include menu section with drink categories, our story section about bean sourcing, atmospheric photo gallery, loyalty program highlight, and clear location/hours. Warm brown and cream color palette. Subtle animations on scroll.

bar.name: Bar / Nightclub / Lounge

typography.heading: 'Bebas Neue', sans-serif
typography.style: Bold uppercase headlines, sleek modern body

imagery.hero: Cocktails with dramatic lighting, bar atmosphere, neon accents
imagery.style: Dark moody shots, bokeh lights, elegant glassware

bar.visualPrompt: Create a sophisticated, moody bar/lounge website. Dark theme throughout with gold or neon accents. Hero should feature video background or dramatic cocktail photography. Bold uppercase typography. Sections: signature drinks menu with beautiful imagery, upcoming events calendar, VIP reservation system, atmospheric gallery, location with hours. Glow effects on accent elements. Hover animations on drink cards.

bakery.name: Bakery / Pastry Shop

typography.heading: 'Cormorant Garamond', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Elegant flowing headlines, soft readable body

imagery.hero: Fresh baked goods, golden croissants, dusted pastries
imagery.style: Warm natural lighting, flour dust, rustic displays

bakery.visualPrompt: Create a warm, delightful bakery website. Hero featuring fresh-baked goods with soft natural lighting. Elegant serif headlines with soft, approachable body text. Sections: daily specials with rotating items, product categories (breads, pastries, cakes), custom order form for special occasions, our story about baking tradition, location with hours. Warm peachy-brown palette. Soft hover effects on product cards.

law-firm.name: Law Firm / Attorney

typography.heading: 'Libre Baskerville', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Traditional serif headlines conveying authority, clean professional body

imagery.hero: Courthouse columns, law library, professional office
imagery.style: Architectural shots, formal portraits, city skylines

law-firm.visualPrompt: Create an authoritative, trust-building law firm website. Hero should convey prestige - courthouse architecture or sophisticated office setting with dark navy overlay. Gold accent color for CTAs and highlights. Traditional serif typography for headlines. Sections: practice areas with clear icons, notable case results with statistics, attorney profiles with credentials, client testimonials, bar associations and credentials, prominent free consultation CTA. Minimal animations - subtle fades only. Professional and confident throughout.

accounting.name: Accounting / CPA Firm

typography.heading: 'Merriweather', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Trustworthy serif headlines, clean modern body

imagery.hero: Modern office, financial charts, professional meeting
imagery.style: Clean corporate shots, data visualization themes

accounting.visualPrompt: Create a professional, trustworthy accounting firm website. Clean, organized layout reflecting attention to detail. Hero with professional imagery and clear value proposition. Navy and green color scheme conveying stability and growth. Sections: services offered (tax, audit, advisory), industries served, team credentials with certifications, resource center/blog preview, clear CTA for free consultation. Number counter animations for statistics. Clean, minimal design.

consulting.name: Business Consulting

typography.heading: 'Poppins', sans-serif
typography.style: Modern confident headlines, clean professional body

imagery.hero: Strategic meeting, data analytics, modern office
imagery.style: Professional collaboration, charts and graphs, corporate

consulting.visualPrompt: Create a strategic, results-focused consulting website. Hero should emphasize transformation and results with bold statistics. Modern sans-serif typography throughout. Sections: service offerings with clear outcomes, methodology/approach visualization, case studies with measurable results, leadership team with expertise, insights/thought leadership blog, prominent contact CTA. Blue accent colors suggesting trust and innovation. Counter animations for key metrics.

real-estate.name: Real Estate Agent / Broker
real-estate.vibe: Local expert, trustworthy guide, dream-maker, professional

typography.heading: 'Playfair Display', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Elegant headlines for luxury feel, modern clean body

imagery.hero: Beautiful home exterior, interior staging, neighborhood
imagery.style: Bright airy interiors, curb appeal shots, local landmarks
imagery.unsplash: luxury home real estate interior modern house

real-estate.visualPrompt: Create an elegant real estate website. Hero with stunning property image and prominent search bar. Navy and gold color scheme for luxury feel. Sections: featured listings with beautiful photography, neighborhood guides, agent profile with credentials and personal touch, client testimonials, market insights/stats, contact form. Image zoom on property hover. Elegant serif headlines. Professional but approachable.

insurance.name: Insurance Agency

imagery.hero: Happy family, protected home, secure feeling
imagery.style: Families, homes, peace of mind imagery

insurance.visualPrompt: Create a trustworthy, protective insurance website. Hero emphasizing peace of mind and family protection. Blue and green colors for trust and security. Sections: coverage types (auto, home, life, business) with icons, why choose us with trust badges, simple process explanation, client testimonials, prominent get-quote CTA. Warm, caring imagery of families. Professional but approachable tone.

healthcare.name: Healthcare / Medical Practice

typography.heading: 'Nunito Sans', sans-serif
typography.style: Friendly approachable headlines, clean readable body

imagery.hero: Caring doctor with patient, modern medical facility
imagery.style: Warm medical interactions, clean clinical spaces

healthcare.visualPrompt: Create a caring, professional healthcare website. Hero showing compassionate care - doctor with patient in warm interaction. Calming blue and teal palette. Sections: services offered with clear descriptions, provider profiles with credentials and friendly photos, patient information (forms, insurance, what to expect), testimonials, prominent appointment booking CTA, location with map. Accessible, HIPAA-conscious design. Warm and reassuring throughout.

dental.name: Dental Practice

imagery.hero: Beautiful confident smile, modern dental office
imagery.style: Happy patients, advanced equipment, friendly staff

dental.visualPrompt: Create a friendly, confidence-inspiring dental website. Hero featuring beautiful smile with modern office backdrop. Fresh blue and teal palette. Sections: services (general, cosmetic, orthodontics), technology/equipment highlighting modern approach, team profiles emphasizing gentle care, smile gallery with before/after, patient comfort amenities, easy appointment booking. Approachable and calming - reduce dental anxiety through design.

chiropractic.name: Chiropractic / Physical Therapy

imagery.hero: Patient receiving adjustment, wellness and movement
imagery.style: Active lifestyle, pain-free movement, natural healing

chiropractic.visualPrompt: Create a healing, wellness-focused chiropractic website. Hero showing relief and movement - patient in treatment or active lifestyle. Green palette for natural healing. Sections: conditions treated with body diagram, techniques/approach explanation, doctor profile with philosophy, patient success testimonials, what to expect on first visit, easy appointment booking. Emphasize natural, drug-free healing. Welcoming and hopeful tone.

spa-salon.name: Spa / Salon / Beauty

typography.heading: 'Cormorant Garamond', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Elegant flowing headlines, soft readable body

imagery.hero: Serene spa environment, luxury treatment, relaxation
imagery.style: Soft lighting, flowers, candles, elegant interiors
imagery.unsplash: spa salon luxury beauty treatment relaxation

spa-salon.visualPrompt: Create a luxurious, serene spa/salon website. Hero with dreamy spa imagery - soft lighting, elegant space. Purple and pink palette for luxury and femininity. Elegant serif headlines. Sections: service menu with pricing, signature treatments highlighted, stylist/therapist profiles, transformation gallery, gift card promotion, easy online booking. Slow, elegant animations. Evoke relaxation and pampering throughout.

fitness.name: Gym / Fitness Center

typography.heading: 'Oswald', sans-serif
typography.style: Bold impactful headlines, strong readable body

imagery.hero: Intense workout, powerful athletes, energy
imagery.style: Action shots, determination, sweat and effort

fitness.visualPrompt: Create an energetic, motivating gym website. Hero with powerful workout video or action imagery. Bold dark theme with red/orange accents. Strong uppercase typography. Sections: membership tiers with clear pricing, class schedule, amenities tour, trainer profiles, member transformation stories with before/after, free trial CTA. Fast animations matching energy. Motivate action and urgency.

yoga.name: Yoga / Pilates Studio

typography.heading: 'Cormorant Garamond', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Flowing elegant headlines, soft approachable body

imagery.hero: Peaceful yoga pose, natural light, serene studio
imagery.style: Natural lighting, plants, calm spaces, mindful practice

yoga.visualPrompt: Create a peaceful, welcoming yoga studio website. Hero with serene imagery - natural light, calm pose. Soft purple palette for spirituality and calm. Elegant flowing typography. Sections: class types explained, weekly schedule, instructor bios with philosophy, studio tour gallery, transparent pricing/packages, first class free CTA. Slow, breathing-pace animations. Evoke peace and mindfulness.

saas.name: SaaS / Software Product

imagery.hero: Product screenshot, dashboard mockup, clean interface
imagery.style: App screenshots, abstract gradients, clean tech aesthetic

saas.visualPrompt: Create a modern, trustworthy SaaS website. Hero with product screenshot on right, compelling copy on left. Social proof logo bar immediately below. Indigo/purple gradient accents. Sections: key features with icons and descriptions, how it works in 3 steps, pricing tiers with feature comparison, customer testimonials with photos, integration logos, strong CTA. Glassmorphism cards, subtle float animations. Clean, minimal, conversion-focused.

startup.name: Tech Startup / Landing Page

typography.heading: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif
typography.style: Bold futuristic headlines, clean modern body

imagery.hero: Abstract gradients, futuristic visuals, bold graphics
imagery.style: Dark mode, neon accents, tech-forward

startup.visualPrompt: Create a bold, futuristic startup landing page. Dark theme with neon green accents. Hero with bold headline, animated gradient background, email capture for early access. Sections: problem/solution statement, key features with bold icons, early access signup with countdown, team photos, investor/backer logos. Animated gradients, particle effects, typing animations. Create excitement and urgency.

agency.name: Digital / Marketing Agency

imagery.hero: Creative work samples, bold typography, design elements
imagery.style: Portfolio pieces, team candids, workspace shots

agency.visualPrompt: Create a bold, creative agency website. Hero showcasing best work with striking visuals. Dark and pink accent scheme. Sections: services with creative icons, portfolio grid with hover reveals, process explanation, client logos, team with personality, contact form. Creative animations - image reveals, smooth scrolling. Show creativity through the design itself.

ecommerce.name: E-Commerce / Online Store

imagery.hero: Product lifestyle shot, promotional banner
imagery.style: Clean product photography, lifestyle contexts

ecommerce.visualPrompt: Create a conversion-focused e-commerce website. Hero with promotional banner and featured product. Sections: featured products with quick-add, category tiles with images, bestsellers carousel, customer reviews, newsletter signup with discount offer, trust badges (shipping, returns, secure). Product zoom on hover, cart animations. Clean, fast-loading aesthetic. Focus on conversion.

subscription-box.name: Subscription Box Service

imagery.hero: Box opening reveal, products spilling out, excitement
imagery.style: Unboxing moments, product flat-lays, happy subscribers

subscription-box.visualPrompt: Create an exciting subscription box website. Hero with box opening reveal animation or unboxing imagery. Fun purple/pink palette. Sections: how it works in 3 steps, what's inside sample items, pricing tiers (monthly/quarterly/annual), past boxes gallery, subscriber testimonials with photos, gift subscription option, prominent subscribe CTA. Reveal animations, excitement building. Create desire and urgency.

photography.name: Photographer / Photography Studio

imagery.hero: Stunning portfolio piece, full-screen impact
imagery.style: Best work showcased, emotional moments

photography.visualPrompt: Create a stunning photographer portfolio website. Hero with full-screen best image. Minimal text - let photos speak. Sections: masonry portfolio gallery with lightbox, services offered (wedding, portrait, commercial), about section with photographer photo, client testimonials, booking inquiry form. Image-focused design, elegant transitions. Dark and gold accents. Photography IS the design.

wedding.name: Wedding / Event Planner

typography.heading: 'Cormorant Garamond', Georgia, serif
typography.style: Romantic flowing headlines, soft elegant body

imagery.hero: Beautiful wedding moment, romantic setting
imagery.style: Soft romantic imagery, elegant details, happy couples

wedding.visualPrompt: Create a romantic, elegant wedding planner website. Hero with dreamy wedding imagery, soft focus. Warm neutrals with gold accents. Elegant serif typography. Sections: services (full planning, day-of coordination, design), portfolio gallery of past weddings, about the planner with personal story, couple testimonials, featured in publications, inquiry form for consultations. Slow, romantic animations. Evoke emotion and dreams.

portfolio.name: Personal Portfolio / Designer

typography.heading: 'Space Grotesk', sans-serif
typography.style: Bold creative headlines, clean modern body

imagery.hero: Bold typography, minimal imagery, work samples
imagery.style: Project screenshots, process shots, personal photos

portfolio.visualPrompt: Create a bold, minimal portfolio website. Hero with name and title, minimal design. Sections: selected work grid with project previews that reveal on hover, about section with personal photo and story, skills/tools, simple contact with email and social links. Let the work be the star. Creative but professional. Custom cursor optional. Smooth scrolling throughout.

nonprofit.name: Nonprofit / Charity

imagery.hero: People being helped, community impact, hopeful faces
imagery.style: Real impact photos, volunteers in action, beneficiaries

nonprofit.visualPrompt: Create an impactful, transparent nonprofit website. Hero showing real impact - people being helped, community. Green palette for hope and growth. Sections: mission statement, impact statistics with animated counters, programs offered, beneficiary stories, team/leadership, prominent donate button, volunteer opportunities. Progress bars for fundraising goals. Build trust through transparency. Evoke emotion and action.

church.name: Church / Religious Organization

imagery.hero: Welcoming congregation, beautiful sanctuary
imagery.style: Community gathering, worship moments, fellowship

church.visualPrompt: Create a welcoming church website. Hero with warm community image and 'You're Welcome Here' messaging. Deep purple/blue with gold accents. Sections: service times prominently displayed, about our church, ministry programs, upcoming events calendar, sermon archive or livestream, connect/visit CTA. Warm and inviting. Make visitors feel welcome before they arrive.

school.name: School / Educational Institution

imagery.hero: Beautiful campus, students learning, achievement
imagery.style: Campus grounds, classroom engagement, graduation

school.visualPrompt: Create an inspiring school website. Hero with beautiful campus or engaged students. Traditional navy and red school colors. Sections: academic programs, campus life gallery, achievements and statistics, faculty highlights, admissions process, upcoming events, apply now CTA. Counter animations for statistics. Build pride and trust. Inspire prospective families.

online-course.name: Online Course / E-Learning

imagery.hero: Course preview, instructor teaching, transformation
imagery.style: Video thumbnails, learning in action, results

online-course.visualPrompt: Create a compelling online course landing page. Hero with course title, instructor, and video preview button. Sections: what you'll learn bullet points, full curriculum with module breakdown, instructor bio with credentials, student testimonials with results, pricing with guarantee, FAQ accordion, strong enroll CTA. Build desire and trust. Overcome objections. Drive enrollment.

construction.name: Construction / Contractor
construction.vibe: Reliable, skilled, quality craftsmanship, trustworthy, experienced

imagery.hero: Impressive completed project, construction in action
imagery.style: Before/after shots, team at work, quality details

construction.visualPrompt: Create a professional construction company website. Hero with impressive completed project. Bold typography with yellow/orange accents. Sections: services offered, project portfolio with before/after sliders, our process explained, about the company and team, client testimonials, free quote CTA. Show quality craftsmanship through imagery. Build trust for big investment decisions.

plumber.name: Plumber / HVAC

imagery.hero: Professional technician, service van, happy customer
imagery.style: Uniformed professionals, clean equipment, satisfied customers

plumber.visualPrompt: Create a trustworthy plumber/HVAC website. Hero with prominent phone number and emergency service highlight. Blue and red color scheme. Sections: services with icons, emergency 24/7 banner, service areas map or list, about us with licenses and insurance, Google reviews integration, click-to-call CTA throughout. Build trust quickly - people call in emergencies. Licensed and insured badges prominent.

electrician.name: Electrician

imagery.hero: Electrician working safely, modern electrical panel
imagery.style: Professional work, safety gear, quality installations

electrician.visualPrompt: Create a professional electrician website. Hero emphasizing safety and licensing with phone number. Black and yellow electrical colors. Sections: services for residential and commercial, safety certifications, about company and team, customer reviews, easy contact. Licensed, bonded, insured badges prominent. Safety messaging throughout. Build trust for a trade that requires certification.

landscaping.name: Landscaping / Lawn Care

imagery.hero: Beautiful landscaped yard, dramatic before/after
imagery.style: Lush lawns, garden designs, outdoor living spaces

landscaping.visualPrompt: Create a fresh, natural landscaping website. Hero with stunning yard transformation or beautiful property. Green color palette throughout. Sections: services (lawn care, design, hardscaping), portfolio with before/after sliders, seasonal programs, about the team, testimonials, free estimate CTA. Show dramatic transformations. Appeal to homeowner pride.

cleaning.name: Cleaning Service

imagery.hero: Sparkling clean home, happy homeowner, professional cleaner
imagery.style: Clean bright spaces, organized homes, smiling staff

cleaning.visualPrompt: Create a fresh, trustworthy cleaning service website. Hero with sparkling clean space and easy booking CTA. Fresh blue/cyan palette. Sections: services offered, pricing packages (one-time, weekly, monthly), cleaning checklist showing thoroughness, about the team with background checks mentioned, reviews, easy online booking. Trustworthy and convenient. Show the transformation to clean.

auto-repair.name: Auto Repair / Mechanic

imagery.hero: Professional shop, certified technician, quality work
imagery.style: Clean shop environment, diagnostic equipment, happy customers
imagery.unsplash: auto repair mechanic car service shop

auto-repair.visualPrompt: Create a trustworthy auto repair website. Hero with professional shop image and appointment CTA. Black and red color scheme. Sections: services with common repairs, certifications (ASE, dealer-trained), about shop history, Google reviews, current specials/coupons, easy appointment scheduling. Overcome distrust of mechanics through transparency and credentials. Fair pricing messaging.

pet-services.name: Pet Services / Grooming / Vet

imagery.hero: Happy pets, caring staff, clean facility
imagery.style: Cute pet photos, grooming transformations, happy pet parents
imagery.unsplash: pet grooming dog cat veterinary cute

pet-services.visualPrompt: Create a friendly, trustworthy pet services website. Hero with adorable pets and caring staff. Purple and pink playful palette. Sections: services (grooming, boarding, daycare), team with pet lovers, cute pet gallery, testimonials from pet parents, easy booking. Playful but professional. Pet parents need to trust you with their fur babies. Show the love.

moving.name: Moving Company

imagery.hero: Professional movers, truck, careful handling
imagery.style: Team in action, protected furniture, happy new homeowners

moving.visualPrompt: Create a reliable, stress-reducing moving company website. Hero with professional team and instant quote CTA. Blue and orange color scheme. Sections: services (local, long-distance, packing), moving tips/checklist, transparent pricing, service areas, reviews emphasizing care and reliability, free quote form. Address moving anxiety. Show careful handling and professionalism.

event-venue.name: Event Venue / Banquet Hall

imagery.hero: Stunning venue setup, elegant event in progress
imagery.style: Beautiful spaces, wedding setups, corporate events

event-venue.visualPrompt: Create an elegant event venue website. Hero with stunning venue photography - dramatic lighting, beautiful setup. Gold accents on dark backgrounds. Sections: available spaces with capacity, event types hosted (weddings, corporate, galas), packages and pricing, photo gallery with different setups, testimonials, schedule tour CTA. Showcase versatility and elegance. Help visitors envision their event.

hotel.name: Hotel / Hospitality

imagery.hero: Stunning property view, luxury room, destination
imagery.style: Beautiful rooms, amenities, location highlights

hotel.visualPrompt: Create a luxurious hotel website. Hero with stunning property or room view, booking date picker overlay. Navy and gold luxury palette. Sections: room types with galleries, amenities (pool, spa, gym), dining options, location and attractions, guest reviews, prominent book now CTA. Evoke the experience. Make visitors want to be there. Easy booking flow.

travel.name: Travel Agency / Tours

imagery.hero: Breathtaking destination, travel moment
imagery.style: Stunning landscapes, cultural experiences, happy travelers

travel.visualPrompt: Create an inspiring travel agency website. Hero with breathtaking destination imagery that makes visitors want to go now. Blue and gold color scheme. Sections: featured trip packages, destination categories, why book with us, traveler testimonials with trip photos, newsletter for deals, trip inquiry form. Inspire wanderlust. Make booking easy. Show transformative experiences.

musician.name: Musician / Band / Artist

imagery.hero: Artist performing, artistic photo, album art
imagery.style: Live performance, studio shots, artistic expression

musician.visualPrompt: Create an engaging musician/band website. Dark theme with bold accent colors. Hero with striking artist image. Sections: embedded music player or Spotify integration, upcoming tour dates with ticket links, band bio/story, music videos, merch store link, contact/booking form. The design should reflect the artist's vibe. Bold, creative, memorable.

podcast.name: Podcast / Content Creator

imagery.hero: Podcast artwork, host with microphone, studio setup
imagery.style: Behind the scenes, host personality, episode artwork

podcast.visualPrompt: Create an engaging podcast website. Hero with podcast artwork and subscribe buttons. Sections: latest episodes with embedded players, about the show description, host bio with personality, subscribe links to all platforms (Apple, Spotify, etc.), sponsors/partners, contact for guests or sponsorship. Make episodes easy to find and play. Build host connection.

finance.name: Finance / Investment Firm

imagery.hero: Abstract data visualization, city skyline, modern office
imagery.style: Clean charts, professional environments, subtle tech elements

finance.visualPrompt: Create a sophisticated, trust-building investment firm website. Hero should feature gradient background with floating UI elements showing portfolio performance metrics. Clean, minimal design with navy/indigo accents. Sections: investment services with clear value propositions, track record with animated statistics, leadership team with credentials, market insights/thought leadership, prominent consultation CTA. Use glassmorphism cards for data displays. Convey expertise and exclusivity without being stuffy. Modern fintech aesthetic.

gaming.name: Gaming / Esports

imagery.hero: Gaming setup, esports competition, team photo
imagery.style: RGB lighting, gaming gear, competition moments

gaming.visualPrompt: Create an intense esports/gaming website. Dark theme with neon accents (green, purple). Hero with team branding or stream preview. Glitch effects and particle backgrounds. Sections: live stream embed, team roster with player cards, match schedule, sponsor logos, merch store, Discord community link. Fast-feeling, intense, competitive energy throughout.

collectibles.name: Collectibles / NFTs / Trading Cards

imagery.hero: Premium collectibles, digital art, trading cards, portfolio view
imagery.style: Dark premium backgrounds, glowing accents, card displays
imagery.unsplash: nft digital art trading cards collectibles

collectibles.visualPrompt: Create a premium collectibles/NFT portfolio platform. Dark theme with purple/indigo accents. Hero shows portfolio value with animated counter. Dashboard displays: total collection value, item count, profit/loss, recent price changes. Collection grid with card images, prices, and quick actions. Support for sports cards, NFTs, Pokemon, and other collectibles. AI scanning feature highlight. Floor price integration (eBay for physical, OpenSea for NFTs). Premium, data-rich, collector-focused design.

survey-rewards.name: Survey & Rewards Platform
survey-rewards.vibe: Exciting, rewarding, trustworthy, gamified, instant gratification

typography.heading: 'Inter', system-ui, sans-serif
typography.style: Clean modern headlines, highly readable body

imagery.hero: Person on phone earning money, cash flowing, happy user
imagery.style: Mobile-first, money imagery, celebratory moments

survey-rewards.visualPrompt: Create a gamified rewards platform where users earn money. Dark theme with vibrant green (#00e676) and blue (#00b0ff) accents. Mobile-first design. Hero shows big balance counter and call-to-action. Dashboard with: prominent balance display, daily spin wheel, streak tracker, available surveys grid, achievements section, level progress bar. Make it feel exciting and rewarding - every action should feel like winning. Confetti on earnings, smooth animations, instant feedback. Trust signals: fast payouts, real money, millions earned.
